00006 // Initialise All stuff needed by the System Layer
00007
00008 using namespace Omiscid;
00009
00010 // Objects to prevent multiple access and count instances
00011 static Mutex OmiscidComLayerInitMutex;
00012 static unsigned int OmiscidComLayerInitInstanceCount = 0;
00013
00014 // Function to do mandatory initialisation
00015
00016 OmiscidComLayerInitClass::OmiscidComLayerInitClass()
00017     : OmiscidSystemLayerInitClass()
00018 {
00019     // Enter locker
00020     OmiscidComLayerInitMutex.Lock();    // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00021
00022     OmiscidComLayerInitInstanceCount++;
00023     if ( OmiscidComLayerInitInstanceCount == 1 )
00024     {
00025         // First instance, do init for Layer System
00026
00027         // now init this layer
00028         OmiscidTrace( "Init Com layer\n" );
00029     }
00030
00031     // Leave locker
00032     OmiscidComLayerInitMutex.Unlock();  // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00033 }
00034
00035 OmiscidComLayerInitClass::~OmiscidComLayerInitClass()
00036 {
00037     // Enter locker
00038     OmiscidComLayerInitMutex.Lock();    // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00039
00040     OmiscidComLayerInitInstanceCount--;
00041     if ( OmiscidComLayerInitInstanceCount == 0 )
00042     {
00043         // Last instance, do reset for Layer System
00044
00045         // now init this layer
00046         OmiscidTrace( "Free Com layer\n" );
00047     }
00048
00049     // Leave locker
00050     OmiscidComLayerInitMutex.Unlock();  // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00051 }
